tree
====

Collection of basic utilities for tree-related tasks

API
---

### each

`each(tree, fn (node, path) {})`

### path

`path(tree, path, /* newValue */)`

### delete

`delete(tree, path, /* options */)`

### map

`map(tree, fn (node, path) {})`

### copy

`copy(tree)`

### flatten

`flatten(tree)`
